title: Bruce Arians's Retirement, Lamar’s Extension, and the State of the Patriots
description:
Kevin, Nora, and Kaelen react to the news of Bruce Arians retiring and what it means for Todd Bowles and the Bucs, Lamar Jackson’s extension, and Robert Kraft’s recent comments. Then they are joined by Steven Ruiz to talk about how the Bucs will look under Todd Bowles and their chances in the NFC this year.

Host: Kevin Clark, Nora Princiotti, and Steven Ruiz
Associate Producer: Stefan Anderson
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
